scripts.network: pnpm happ:build-debug && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "pnpm local-services" "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm launch"
scripts.network:mobile: pnpm happ:build-debug && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "pnpm local-services" "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri ios dev" "pnpm tauri dev"
scripts.test: pnpm run happ:build-debug && nix flake check -L && pnpm -F tests test
